tweets.author: ARC Raiders
tweets.text: ARC Raiders is here. Scavenge, survive, and thrive on a dangerous future Earth ruled by machines. Team up or go it alone, every surface run carries risk and reward. Available Now.

thread_replies.author: Uhleet.eth
thread_replies.text:
Another good strat is just running any keys you‚Äôve accumulated and run them on 2x map conditions w/ a minimal load out. I usually will bring an Anvil or Ferro and a stitcher + blue looting augment. 

Scrape the room and extract.  I‚Äôve been doing it all day for 50-90k a key.

thread_replies.author: Ivory Branch
thread_replies.text: Tragic that Nightreign didn't win (and didn't make it past the first round of Player's Voice), but I do find it heartwarming to see it showcase such a passionate fanbase. Honestly, the audience's recognition means as much as the award.
